pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Features
See and filter both system and user units simultaneously. Supports all unit types. Units ordered by service, timer, socket, and the rest. Runs sudo automatically and only if necessary. Filter units by state using ctrl-s or the --state option. Run daemon-reload with ctrl-r. Has short versions of systemctl commands to reduce typing. Runs status after other commands (start, stop, restart, etc). Select multiple units, states, and commands using TAB. Only prompts commands based on current state (e.g. show "start" only if the unit is inactive).
